page.title: 20Indoor Games
page.content:
{Snap.}You have one pack of cards with pictures on each. There are two pictures of each thing. When you find two pictures you say "Snap".
{Blind Man's Buff}In this game you need a bit of rag to cover one of the player's eyes and they have to catch the other people.
When it is raining we play{pillow {fights.}We get a pillow and throw it at the other person. It doesn't matter how many play but the first person to knock the other person over wins.
{Scrabble}is a game for 4 people. You have 7 letters and you must think up some words. In the middle there is a star from which you build up words. The longer the word the more points you get.
